Texts.Eng: Congratulations - with six crew members you now qualify for the Falcon License! ^green;Visit Penguin Pete^reset; with ^orange;6 Upgrade Modules^reset; to upgrade your ship.
Texts.Por: Parabéns - com seis tripulantes agora você se qualifica para a Falcon License! ^green;Visite Penguin Pete^reset; com ^orange;6 Upgrade Modules^reset; para atualizar sua nave.
